languages.text: "Каждый вздох мой, слово мое и движение происходят лишь по велению Его. Не смею перечить я Неумирающему ни в смерти дарящей и отнимающей, ни даже в факте бытия живым".
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
languages.original_text: "Каждый вздох мой, слово мое и движение происходят лишь по велению Его. Не смею перечить я Неумирающему ни в смерти дарящей и отнимающей, ни даже в факте бытия живым".

traits.locale_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Immortal One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Immortal One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Immortal One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Immortal One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
"I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

languages.text: «Hablo, me muevo y respiro porque Él lo desea. No desafío al Inmortal, ni en la muerte que otorga ni en la vida que sigo».
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

traits.locale_text: «Hablo, me muevo y respiro porque Él lo desea. No desafío al Inmortal, ni en la muerte que otorga ni en la vida que sigo».

languages.text: 「私が話し、動き、息をするのは、あの方がそう望まれるからだ。私は不滅の者に逆らわない。与え奪われる死にも、生きている私の存在にも」
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

traits.locale_text: 「私が話し、動き、息をするのは、あの方がそう望まれるからだ。私は不滅の者に逆らわない。与え奪われる死にも、生きている私の存在にも」

languages.text: “我的话语、行动、呼吸，都是祂的旨意。我绝不会忤逆不死之神，无论是在生前，还是在包罗万象的死亡之后。”
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

traits.locale_text: “我的话语、行动、呼吸，都是祂的旨意。我绝不会忤逆不死之神，无论是在生前，还是在包罗万象的死亡之后。”

languages.text: "Ich spreche, atme und bewege mich, weil er es wünscht. Ich widersetze mich dem Todlosen nicht, weder im Tod, der schenkt und nimmt, noch in meinem lebendigen Dasein."
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich spreche, atme und bewege mich, weil er es wünscht. Ich widersetze mich dem Todlosen nicht, weder im Tod, der schenkt und nimmt, noch in meinem lebendigen Dasein."

languages.text: « Je parle, j'agis et je respire par la seule volonté de l'Immortel. Je lui suis entièrement soumis, que ce soit de mon vivant ou dans la mort qui donne et qui reprend. »
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."

traits.locale_text: « Je parle, j'agis et je respire par la seule volonté de l'Immortel. Je lui suis entièrement soumis, que ce soit de mon vivant ou dans la mort qui donne et qui reprend. »

languages.text: "İmparator nasıl arzularsa öyle konuşur, hareket eder ve nefes alırım. Ne ödüllendirip nihayete erdiren ölümde ne de kanlı canlı mevcudiyetimde Ölmeyen'e karşı çıkmam."
languages.original_text: "I speak, move, and draw breath because He wills so. I defy not the Undying One, neither in death that gifts and takes nor in my living existence."
